name: Kill The Arcade
description:
KILL THE ARCADE  is a roguelite shooter that is set in a fully functioning arcade.

You play as Kidd, an employee at Arcadia, the local arcade. One day the owner purchases a mysterious new game no one has heard of. That game is SINISTER.

As you go to investigate this new machine, something strange occurs. Suddenly you are surrounded by all the characters of the arcade games, but for real. You have no choice but to start blasting, hope you can can end this bizarre turn of events.

  • Build your weapon from scratch
  • Unlock parts, weapons, tools, and toys from the PRIZE ROOM
  • Talk to all manner of strange "people" inhabiting the arcade
  • Help fix up the arcade by adding new machines the more you play
  • All machines in arcade FULLY PLAYABLE (eventually...)
  • Game gets harder as you play, unlocking tougher enemies
CONTROLS:
  • WASD  -  Move
  • CLICK  -  Shoot
  • SPACEBAR  -  Interact
  • C - Bomb
  • R - Reload
